name: Textris
description:
Textris [v1.1]

Like Tetris? Like typing? Then you'll love Textris*

Type the flashing word before it reaches the bottom of the screen. Get a letter wrong and you'll have to start the word from the beginning again. If the words stack up to the top of the screen, it's game over.

This game is an entry for the RVG/Phoenixware Cassette 50 charity competition. All code must reside below $1000 in memory.

v1.1: Toggle hard mode with F1. Score is x4 in hard mode. Level progression now every 5 correct words

*Disclaimer: you might not
